jenkins_home.description: Home directory of the Jenkins user.

group.description: Name of the Jenkins group on the OS.

updates_url.description: URL of the Update Centre. Used as the base URL to download the plugins and the I(update-center.json) JSON file.

with_dependencies.description: Defines whether to install plugin dependencies. This option takes effect only if the I(version) is not defined.

state.description: Desired plugin state. If the C(latest) is set, the check for new version will be performed every time. This is suitable to keep the plugin up-to-date.

version.description: Plugin version number. If this option is specified, all plugin dependencies must be installed manually. It might take longer to verify that the correct version is installed. This is especially true if a specific version number is specified. Quote the version to prevent the value to be interpreted as float. For example if C(1.20) would be unquoted, it would become C(1.2).

params.description: Option used to allow the user to overwrite any of the other options. To remove an option, set the value of the option to C(null).

mode.description: File mode applied on versioned plugins.

owner.description: Name of the Jenkins user on the OS.

updates_expiration.description: Number of seconds after which a new copy of the I(update-center.json) file is downloaded. This is used to avoid the need to download the plugin to calculate its checksum when C(latest) is specified. Set it to C(0) if no cache file should be used. In that case, the plugin file will always be downloaded to calculate its checksum when C(latest) is specified.
